name: Monster Challenge Circus
description: Slay the evil that has decimated your universe!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista Processor: 2 GHz processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9c Compatible video card w/128mb vram Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This is truly one of the weirdest thing on steam, don't expect anything remotely playable, even turning the camera is completely insane.  The base idea isn't even bad, it has a weird atmosphere and doesn't look too bad, but it's a real mess gameplay wise. Not even good for the lulz :(
This is the worst game on steam
